titleInfo.title: The correspondence of Athanasius Kircher [electronic resource] : the world of a seventeenth century Jesuit : an international research project / Michael John Gorman and Nick Wilding

mods.abstract: "The Athanasius Kircher correspondence project was created with the goal of making the manuscript correspondence of Athanasius Kircher available on the Internet. The project was commenced through the collaboration of the Istituto e Museo di Storia della Scienza in Florence, the Pontifical Gregorian University in Rome and the European University Institute in Fiesole, under the direction of Michael John Gorman and Nick Wilding. Since September 2000, the project has been rehoused at Stanford University." -- Introduction.

location.physicalLocation: Archives of the Pontifical Gregorian University, APUG 560
